Text.Page:
We need to hurt the arachnens at a basic level. Go after {@LinkCreature:39#131#arachnen matrons} and {@LinkCreature:39#130#matriarchs}, and {@LinkCreature:39#140#slave wardens} in the lower level of the Arachnaea.

When you're finished, report to Greina at Roughneck Outpost.
This was a dangerous mission, and you performed well.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:39#130#arachnen matriarchs}, {@LinkCreature:39#131#arachnen matrons}, and {@LinkCreature:39#140#slave wardens} and bring me proof of their deaths.
